channel.title: Prevent Java failure... help?
channel.description:
I love this game and it's getting annoying not being able to play...
[b][u]The problem:[/u][/b]
There has been many complaints already im aware, but when I try to get on just a big white box comes up... With a whiter box with a red cross in the corner... And it says "Java application failed".
Help guys! Whats happening? :eek:

item.title: Prevent Java failure... help?
item.dc:creator: @Awesomesauce Awesomesauce
item.description:
@Awesomesauce wrote:

Is it safe downloading that?

Read full topic

item.title: Prevent Java failure... help?
item.dc:creator: @Screwy Screwy
item.description:
@Screwy wrote:

You don’t have Java JRE. PLEASE USE SEARCH. Got to https://sdlc1e.sun.com:443/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=4631E3F11E2F3298F252B5568447213E to download Java JDK and JRE. The have to be the same version for the compiling and stuff to work. This is Java JDKu1. When you get to the site click accept at the top, then click Windows installation offline or online. Click offline if you have good download speed.

Read full topic
